src_original: prāptopadeśaḥ subhagaḥ suśiṣyo baudhau hi cittaṃ paramārthanāma /
sarvabhāvavigataṃ skandhadhātvāyatanagrāhyagrāhakavarjitaṃ dharmanairātmyasamatayā svacittam ādyanutpannaṃ śūnyatāsvabhāvamiti /
svacchaṃ śuddhaṃ susūkṣmaṃ paramaśivamayaṃ buddhanirvāṇadhātum /  nirdvandvaṃ nirvikalpaṃ satatasukhamayaṃ bhāvayet tattvayogī
